title: What is audio conferencing and what are it's benefits? - Quora

response.answer_text: Audio conferencing or conference calling is the best tool for encouraging clear and timely communication within an organization. Audio conferencing is a telephone meeting among two or more participants involving technology more sophisticated than a simple two-way phone connection. It increases employee productivity by enabling them to collaborate at any time, from any location, with local support available 24/7.
